title: Ranked teams (Bronze)
body:
Looking to join a ranked team
I'm not the best player, as I'm only bronze 1. But I'd like to join a ranked team so that i can practice and improve. 
If any preferences, I'd like Mid. I can play champs such as LB, Diana or Malz. I can also expand my champ pool if needed.
Ty, My in game name is Jecx. Hmu if interested
